97 articles. - Pp. xi-xiv: Preface; - xv-xxiv: Willy CLARYSSE, Bibliography of Jan Quaegebeur 1969-1997; - xxv-xxx: Claude VANDERSLEYEN, La vie de Jan Quaegebeur (14 décembre 1943 - 10 août 1995); - II, pp. 1509-1525: W. CLARYSSE and M. COENEN, Index.
bibl.seg: CLARYSSE Willy, Antoon SCHOORS and Harco WILLEMS (Edd.), Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I; - Part II. (Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 84; - 85.)
Leuven, Peeters - Departement Oosterse Studies, 1998, 8°, xxx-750 pp.; - pp. 751-1525, 1 portrait en front., tabl., figg., cartes, plans, pll. ISBN 90-429-0669-3. 9.000 fr. b.
